verbs.description: [ARG0: Finance Minister Bill Morneau] [V: spoke] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-LOC: at a meeting of finance ministers from the G7 in Whistler , British Columbia] , [ARGM-ADV: saying the threat of retaliatory measures could work against Trump] .
